pages.text: The results of combining [Azurite](entry://resources/azurite) and the protective properties of [Blue Pigment](entry://general/pigment@blue) really sparked your interest. The material seemed to surround itself with a transparent aura which took some effort to penetrate when you reached for the lump.\\_This is going to be interesting..._

pages.title: Azure Dike
pages.text: A magical aura surrounding your body, shielding you from incoming damage.\Slowly, but steadily recharges up to a specific amount.\\Each piece of Azure Dike Equipment increases the maximum amount of protection.

pages.title: Azure Dike Ring
pages.text: - Grants you [#](495b24)4[#]() points of [#](2c2e8e)Azure Dike[#]()\- Slightly speeds up [#](2c2e8e)Azure Dike[#]() charging

pages.title: Azure Dike Belt
pages.text: - Grants you [#](495b24)6[#]() points of [#](2c2e8e)Azure Dike[#]()\- Increases [#](2c2e8e)Azure Dike[#]() recovery after a hit, making it recharge quicker

pages.title: Shieldgrasp Amulet
pages.text: Infuse it with [Blue Ink](entry://magic/ink) in a [Color Picker](entry://magic/color_picker) to increase the amount of [#](2c2e8e)Azure Dike[#]() provided.\Cheap at first, the required energy to infuse more power into this amulet increases exponentially.
